summary: The diff shows that REQ-87 and REQ-88 were successfully implemented by updating both Teachers.tsx and TeachersNotes.tsx to reference the new Santanu Sir photo at '/assets/generated/santanu-sir-new.dim_400x400.jpg'. However, REQ-89 is missing - there is no evidence that the image file 'image (2)-5.jpg' was actually added to the frontend/public/assets/generated directory. The diff shows no added files, and the components reference a renamed version ('santanu-sir-new.dim_400x400.jpg') rather than the original filename.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store the uploaded Santanu Sir photo 'image (2)-5.jpg' as a static asset in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows 0 added files. There is no evidence that the image file was added to the frontend/public/assets/generated directory. The components reference '/assets/generated/santanu-sir-new.dim_400x400.jpg', but the actual file addition is not visible in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: The image filename was changed from 'image (2)-5.jpg' to 'santanu-sir-new.dim_400x400.jpg' with dimension suffix
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifically mentions storing and using 'image (2)-5.jpg', but the implementation uses 'santanu-sir-new.dim_400x400.jpg'. While this may be a reasonable technical decision for asset processing, it was not requested and represents a deviation from the specified filename.
